name: Laces and Loops
description:
Official Entry for the Ludum Dare 47

In the year 3030, Tim Timebow is about to throw the game-winning pass, but due to cyberbionic enhancements he throws a spiral so hard he rips a hole in the fabric of space-time! Timmy is tossed back a few thousands years, but with the help of the ghost of Billy Bullichungus (and a few performance enhancing drugs) he's gonna battle the hordes of timefighters and warp his way back to the big game just in time for the final whistle.

Font credits: Bebas Neue by Dharma Type, 2015 Iconian Fonts - Daniel Zadorozny
